member.name: T:ALARM.Machine
member.summary: This class acts as the base class for your machines

member.name: T:ALARM.Core.Machines.MachineLoader
member.summary: This class loads other mods' machines. This class can also be used to lookup the index of other mods' machines. If you want to add machines, use MachineLoader.AddMachine().

member.name: F:ALARM.Core.Machines.MachineLoader.nameToEntry
member.summary: This takes the mod and the name of a machine and gets the MachineEntry associated with it.

member.name: M:ALARM.Core.Machines.MachineLoader.Initialize
member.summary: This function initializes and registers other mods' machines.

member.name: M:ALARM.Core.Machines.MachineLoader.AddMachine``1(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod,System.String)
member.summary: This can be used to add multiple machines of the same class.

member.name: M:ALARM.Core.Machines.MachineLoader.AddMachine(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: This can be used to add multiple machines of the same class.
